Description: Live on the banks of the Charles River in Cambridge's highly sought after Riverside neighborhood! Just minutes from the Red Line at Central station as well as many major MBTA bus routes for an easy commute! Close to shopping, trendy dining, exciting nightlife and bars, & much more! Convenient to Harvard University, Central Square, Lesley University, Kendall Square, MIT, Inman Square, parks along the Charles River, Harvard Business School, as well as a quick ride on the Red Line to Downtown Boston, Mass General Hospital, Boston Common, South Station commuter trains, Beacon Hill, and all that the Boston area has to offer!
